book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕϭⲟⲙ ⲧⲏⲣⲥ̅ ⲙⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲕ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϣⲙ̅ϣⲉ ⲛⲁϥ.
English: Love him that made thee with all thy strength, and forsake not his ministers.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲅ̅ϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲟⲩⲏⲏⲃ ⲛⲅ̅ϯ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲧⲟ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲑⲉ ⲉⲛⲧⲁϥϩⲱⲛ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧⲕ̅.
English: Fear the Lord, and honour the priest; and give him his portion, as it is commanded thee;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲡⲁⲣⲭⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡϯϩⲁⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϭⲃⲟⲓ̈ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲑⲩⲥⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲁⲡⲁⲣⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ:
English: the firstfruits, and the trespass offering, and the gift of the shoulders, and the sacrifice of sanctification, and the firstfruits of the holy things.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕϭⲓϫ ⲉⲫⲏⲕⲉ ϫⲉ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲕⲥⲙⲟⲩ ϫⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: And stretch thine hand unto the poor, that thy blessing may be perfected.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲉⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲱⲗⲩ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲙⲟⲧ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩⲣⲉϥⲙⲟⲟⲩⲧ.
English: A gift hath grace in the sight of every man living; and for the dead detain it not.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲣⲓⲙⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲧⲣⲓⲙⲉ ⲁⲣⲓϩⲏⲃⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲏⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲛⲁⲁⲩ ⲉϭⲙ̅ⲡϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϣⲱⲛⲉ: ⲉⲩⲛⲁⲙⲉ....
English: Fail not to be with them that weep, and mourn with them that mourn. (35) Be not slow to visit the sick: fir that shall make thee to be beloved.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϣⲁϫⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲁⲣⲓ ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕϩⲁⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲁⲛ ⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ.
English: Whatsoever thou takest in hand, remember the end, and thou shalt never do amiss.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲓϣⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ⲉⲓ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅.
English: Strive not with a mighty man’ lest thou fall into his hands.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲧⲱⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛϥ̅ϣⲓ ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲟⲩⲃⲏⲕ.
English: Be not at variance with a rich man, lest he overweigh thee:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲧⲁⲕⲉ ϩⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲣⲓⲕⲉ ⲙ̅ⲫⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲣⲱⲟⲩ.
English: for gold hath destroyed many, and perverted the hearts of kings.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲓϣⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϫⲁⲥⲧ̅ ⲥⲙⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲁⲗⲉ ϣⲉ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲕⲱϩⲧ̅.
English: Strive not with a man that is full of tongue, and heap not wood upon his fire.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲥⲱⲃⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲁⲧⲥⲃⲱ ϫⲉ ⲛⲉⲩⲥⲱϣ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲉⲓⲟⲧⲉ.
English: Jest not with a rude man, lest thy ancestors be disgraced.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲛⲟϭⲛⲉϭ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲁϥⲥⲁϩⲱϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ: ⲁⲣⲓⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ϫⲉ ⲧⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛⲧϭⲁⲓ̈ⲟ ⲧⲏⲣⲛ̅.
English: Reproach not a man that turneth from sin, but remember that we are all worthy of punishment.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲥⲉϣ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲗ̅ⲗⲟ: ⲉⲩⲣ̅ϩⲗ̅ⲗⲟ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲛ̅.
English: Dishonour not a man in his old age: for even some of us wax old.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣⲁϣⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲁ ⲉⲁϥⲙⲟⲩ: ⲁⲣⲓⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ϫⲉ ⲧⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲙⲟⲩ ⲧⲏⲣⲛ̅.
English: Rejoice not over thy greatest enemy being dead, but remember that we die all.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲃϣⲕ̅ ⲉⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ⲉⲕⲉⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ⲇⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩⲡⲁⲣϩⲟⲓⲙⲓⲁ.
English: Despise not the discourse of the wise, but acquaint thyself with their proverbs:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲉⲕⲛⲁⲥⲁⲃⲟ ⲉⲧⲉⲥⲃⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓⲧⲟⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧϭⲓⲛϣⲙ̅ϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ.
English: for of them thou shalt learn instruction, and how to serve great men with ease.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲕ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲗ̅ⲗⲟ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩⲥⲁⲃⲟ ϩⲱⲟⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲓⲧⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩⲉⲓⲟⲧⲉ.
English: Miss not the discourse of the elders: for they also learned of their fathers,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: and of them thou shalt learn understanding, and to give answer as need requireth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲙ̅ϩⲉ ⲛ̅ϫⲃ̅ⲃⲉⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ....... ⲕⲱϩⲧ̅ .....
English: Kindle not the coals of a sinner, lest thou be burnt with the flame of his fire.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲱⲛⲕ̅ ϩⲁⲑⲏ ⲙ... ϫⲉⲕⲁⲁⲥ ⲉⲛⲛⲉϥ.........ⲣⲱⲕ.
English: Rise not up in anger at the presence of an injurious person, lest he lie in wait to entrap thee in thy words

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯⲉⲙⲏⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲕⲁⲛ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛϯ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲥⲟⲣⲙⲟⲩ.
English: Lend not unto him that is mightier than thyself; for if thou lendest him, count it but lost.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϣⲡ̅ⲧⲱⲣⲉ ⲡⲁⲣⲁ ⲧⲉⲕϭⲟⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛϣⲡ̅ⲧⲱⲣⲉ ϥⲓ ⲡⲣⲟⲟⲩϣ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲁⲩ.
English: Be not surety above thy power: for if thou be surety, take care to pay it.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲓϩⲁⲡ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲉϥϯϩⲁⲡ: ⲉⲩⲛⲁⲕⲣⲓⲛⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: Go not to law with a judge; for they will judge for him according to his honour.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ϩⲓ ϩⲓⲏ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲟⲗⲙⲏⲣⲟⲥ ϫⲉⲕⲁⲥ ⲉⲛⲛⲉϥⲧⲱⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲉϫⲱⲕ.
English: Travel not by the way with a bold fellow, lest he become grievous unto thee:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉϥⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲕⲛⲁⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲡⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲑⲏⲧ.
English: for he will do according to his own will, and thou shalt perish with him through his folly.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲓϣⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲉϥϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ⲛⲉⲙⲁϥ ϩⲓ ⲡϫⲁⲉⲓⲉ.
English: Strive not with an angry man, and go not with him into a solitary place:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲕⲥⲛⲟϥ ⲛⲛ̅ⲁϩⲣⲁϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϥⲛⲁⲧⲁⲩⲟⲕ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ..... ⲙⲛ̅ ⲃⲟⲏⲑⲓⲁ.
English: for blood is as nothing in his sight, and where there is no help, he will overthrow thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Consult not with a fool; for he cannot keep counsel.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Do no secret thing before a stranger; for thou knowest not what he will bring forth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Open not thine heart to every man, lest he requite thee with a shrewd turn.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Be not jealous over the wife of thy bosom, and teach her not an evil lesson against thyself.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅..............ⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲧⲣⲉ ..ⲥ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕϭⲟⲙ.
English: Give not thy soul unto a woman to set her foot upon thy substance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲱⲙⲛ̅ⲧ ⲉⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲧⲉⲣⲁ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ϩⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲥϭⲟⲣϭⲥ̅.
English: Meet not with an harlot, lest thou fall into her snares.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲁϣⲟⲕ ϩⲁⲧⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲧⲯⲁⲗⲗⲉⲓ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲁⲕⲟ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ
English: Use not much the company of a woman that is a singer, lest thou be taken with her attempts.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲉϣⲧ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲁⲣⲑⲉⲛⲟⲥ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ⲥⲕⲁⲛⲇⲁⲗⲓⲍⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲥⲥⲁ.
English: Gaze not on a maid, that thou fall not by those things that are precious in her.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛⲡⲟⲣⲛⲏ ϫⲉⲕⲁⲥ ⲉⲛⲉⲕⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ.
English: Give not thy soul unto harlots, that thou lose not thine inheritance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲟⲩⲣϣ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲓⲣ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ⲟⲩⲇⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲱⲧⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲥⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ϫⲁⲓ̈ⲉ.
English: Look not round about thee in the streets of the city, neither wander thou in the solitary place thereof.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲧⲉ ⲛⲉⲕⲃⲁⲗ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲓⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲟⲩϣⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲁ ⲉⲙⲡⲱⲕ ⲁⲛ.
English: Turn away thine eye from a beautiful woman, and look not upon another’s beauty;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ϩⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲥⲱⲣⲙ̅ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲥⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϩⲓⲟⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧϣⲃⲏⲣ .... ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲱϩⲧ̅.
English: for many have been deceived by the beauty of a woman; for herewith love is kindled as a fire.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Sit not at all with another man’s wife, nor sit down with her in thine arms, and spend not thy money with her at the wine;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: lest thine heart incline unto her, and so through thy desire thou fall into destruction.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲕ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲛⲁⲥ: ⲡⲃⲣ̅ⲣⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ϣⲏϣ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁϥ ⲁⲛ
English: Forsake not an old friend; for the new is not comparable to him:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲏⲣⲡ̅ ⲃ̅ⲃⲣ̅ⲣⲉ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲃ̅ⲃⲣ̅ⲣⲉ: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉϥϣⲁⲛⲱⲥⲕ̅ ϣⲁⲕⲥⲟⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ.
English: a new friend is as new wine; when it is old, thou shalt drink it with pleasure.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲱϩ ⲉⲡⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲥⲟⲟⲩⲛ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲁⲛ ϫⲉ ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉϥϣⲟⲣϣⲣ̅.
English: Envy not the glory of a sinner: for thou knowest not what shall be his end.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲱϣ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲁⲥⲉⲃⲏⲥ: ⲁⲣⲓⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲧⲙⲁⲓ̈ⲟ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ
English: Delight not in the thing that the ungodly have pleasure in; but remember they shall not go unpunished unto their grave.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲁϩⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲩⲛ̅ⲧϥ̅ ⲧⲉⲝⲟⲩⲥⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲧⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲕⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲉⲑⲟⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲙⲟⲩ.
English: Keep thee far from the man that hath power to kill; so shalt thou not doubt the fear of death:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁⲛ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛϯ ⲡⲉⲕⲟⲩⲟⲓ̈ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ. ϫⲉⲕⲁⲁⲥ ⲉⲛⲛⲉϥϥⲓ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲱⲛϩ̅.
English: and if thou come unto him, make no fault, lest he take away thy life presently:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲓⲙⲉ ϫⲉ ⲉⲕⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛϭⲟⲣϭⲥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲃⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ.
English: remember that thou goest in the midst of snares, and that thou walkest upon the battlements of the city.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲧⲉⲕϭⲟⲙ ϯ ϩⲧⲏⲕ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲉⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱⲕ. ⲁⲩⲱ ϫⲓϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ.
English: As near as thou canst, guess at thy neighbour, and consult with the wise.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ. ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲕ....
English: Let thy talk be with the wise, and all thy communication in the law of the most High.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲁⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲇⲓⲕⲁⲓⲟⲥ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅...... ⲟⲩⲱⲙ ϩⲓ ⲥⲱ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲑⲟⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: And let just men eat and drink with thee; and let thy glorying be in the fear of the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲩⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲉ ⲫⲱⲃ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧϭⲓϫ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲉϥⲣ̅ⲉⲓⲟⲡⲉ. ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲟⲩⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ⲡⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ.
English: For the hand of the artificer the work shall be commended: and the wise ruler of the people for his speech.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲣⲉϥϯϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲱϣ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲩⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉ ⲡⲣⲉϥϥⲟϭϥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ.
English: A man of an ill tongue is dangerous in his city; and he that is rash in his talk shall be hated.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲕⲣⲓⲧⲏⲥ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ϣⲁϥϯⲥⲃⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲑⲏⲅⲉⲙⲟⲛⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲛⲁϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲥⲧⲏϣ.
English: A wise judge will instruct his people; and the government of a prudent man is well ordered.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲣⲓⲧⲏⲥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϣⲙ̅ϣⲉ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲏϩ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲥ.
English: As the judge of the people is himself, so are his officers; and what manner of man the ruler of the city is, such are all they that dwell therein.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲣ̅ⲣⲟ ⲛ̅ⲁⲧⲥⲃⲱ ϣⲁϥⲥⲱⲣⲙ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ϭⲱⲣϭ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ.
English: An unwise king destroyeth his people; but through the prudence of them which are in authority the city shall be inhabited.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲝⲟⲩⲥⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲁϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧϭⲓϫ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ........................
English: The power of the earth is in the hand of the Lord, and in due time he will set over it one that is profitable.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧϭⲓϫ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁϥϯ ⲡⲉϥⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲫⲟ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲅⲣⲁⲙⲙⲁⲧⲉⲩⲥ.
English: In the hand of God is the prosperity of man: and upon the person of the scribe shall he lay his honour.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲩϭⲥ̅ ⲉⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱⲕ ϩⲓ ϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲉϥⲥⲏϣ.
English: Bear not hatred to thy neighbour for every wrong; and do nothing at all by injurious practices.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧϫⲁⲥⲓϩⲏⲧ ⲉϣⲁⲩⲙⲉⲥⲧⲱⲥ ϩⲓⲧⲛ̅ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲣ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓⲧⲟⲟⲧⲟⲩ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩⲥⲟⲡ ϣⲁⲩⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅.
English: Pride is hateful before God and man: and by both doth one commit iniquity.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲩⲡⲉⲛⲉ ⲟⲩⲣ̅ⲣⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲉⲩϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅ ϩⲓ ⲥⲱϣ ϩⲓ ⲭⲣⲏⲙⲁ.
English: Because of unrighteous dealings, injuries, and riches got by deceit, the kingdom is translated from one people to another.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϩⲣⲟϥ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲕⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲉⲥ ϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ; ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲛⲟⲩϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲡⲉϥϩⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲉⲟⲩϫⲁⲓ̈.
English: Why is earth and ashes proud? There is not a more wicked thing than a covetous man: for such an one setteth his own soul to sale; because while he liveth he casteth away his bowels.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲥⲁⲉⲓⲛ ϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲱⲛⲉ ⲉⲛⲁϣⲱϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲟ ⲛ̅ⲣ̅ⲣⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲟⲩ ϥⲛⲁⲙⲟⲩ ⲣ̅ⲣⲁⲥⲧⲉ.
English: The physician cutteth off a long disease; and he that is to day a king to morrow shall die.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉ ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲣⲉ ϩⲛ̅ϫⲁⲧϥⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ⲑⲏⲣⲓⲟⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ϥⲛ̅ⲧ ⲛⲁⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ.
English: For when a man is dead, he shall inherit creeping things, beasts, and worms.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲣⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧϫⲁⲥⲓ ϩⲏⲧ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉ..... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲁ....
English: The beginning of pride is when one departeth from God, and his heart is turned away from his Maker.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲣⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧϫⲁⲥⲓ ϩⲏⲧ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ: ⲡⲉⲧⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲥ ⲛⲁⲃⲉⲉⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲃⲟⲧⲉ.
English: For pride is the beginning of sin, and he that hath it shall pour out abomination:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲁⲓ ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ... ⲉⲩⲣ̅ϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲛⲉϥⲙⲟⲕⲙⲉⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϣⲣ̅ϣⲱⲣⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϣⲁⲃⲟⲗ.
English: and therefore the Lord brought upon them strange calamities, and overthrew them utterly.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϣⲣ̅ϣⲣ̅ ⲛⲉⲑⲣⲟⲛⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲁⲣⲭⲱⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲑⲙ̅ⲥⲟ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛⲣⲙ̅ⲣⲁϣ ⲉⲡⲉⲩⲙⲁ.
English: The Lord hath cast down the thrones of proud princes, and set up the meek in their stead.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲣ̅ⲕ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲁϥⲧⲱϭⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲑⲃⲃⲓⲏⲩ ⲉⲡⲉⲩⲙⲁ.
English: The Lord hath plucked up the roots of the proud nations, and planted the lowly in their place.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϣⲣ̅ϣⲣ̅ ⲛⲉⲭⲱⲣⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲁϥⲟϫⲛⲟⲩ ϣⲁ ⲛ̅ⲥⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲁϩ.
English: The Lord overthrew countries of the heathen, and destroyed them to the foundations of the earth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲣⲉ ϩⲟⲓ̈ⲛⲉ ϣⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲉⲁϥⲧⲁⲕⲟⲟⲩ: ⲁϥϥⲓ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ.
English: He took some of them away, and destroyed them, and hath made their memorial to cease from the earth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲡⲟⲩⲥⲛ̅ⲧ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧϫⲁⲥⲓ ϩⲏⲧ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲟⲩⲇⲉ ⲧⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϩⲓⲟⲙⲉ.
English: Pride was not made for men, nor furious anger for them that are born of a woman.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϣ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲉⲧⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲏⲩ; ⲡⲉⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲡⲉ. ⲁϣ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲉⲧϣⲏⲥ; ⲡⲉⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲡⲉ.
English: They that fear the Lord are a sure seed, and they that love him an honourable plant:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϣ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲉⲧⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲏⲩ; ⲛⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉ. ⲁϣ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϣⲏⲥ; ⲛⲉⲧⲛⲁⲧ..
English: they that regard not the law are a dishonourable seed; they that transgress the commandments are a deceivable seed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ..........................ⲛⲉⲩⲛⲟϭ ............................ⲏ ⲩⲡⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲉⲧϣⲟⲟⲡ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲁϥ.
English: Among brethren he that is chief is honourably; so are they that fear the Lord in his eyes. (21) The fear of the Lord goeth before the obtaining of authority: but roughness and pride is the losing thereof.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲡⲣⲟⲥⲏⲗⲩⲧⲟⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲏⲩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲫⲏⲕⲉ ⲡⲉⲩϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲑⲟⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: Whether he be rich, noble, or poor, their glory is the fear of the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛϣ̅ϣⲉ ⲁⲛ ⲉⲥⲉϣ ⲟⲩϩⲏⲕⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϣ̅ϣⲉ ⲁⲛ ⲉϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: It is not meet to despise the poor man that hath understanding; neither is it convenient to magnify a sinful man.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲉϥϯϩⲁⲡ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ ϣⲁⲩϫⲓ ⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: Great men, and judges, and potentates, shall be honoured; yet is there none of them greater than he that feareth the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲣⲙ̅ϩⲉ ⲛⲁϣⲙ̅ϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲙⲉϥⲕⲣⲙ̅ⲣⲙ̅.
English: Unto the servant that is wise shall they that are free do service: and he that hath knowledge will not grudge when he is reformed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲥⲁⲕ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲉⲣ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲱⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁⲕ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕϩⲟϫϩϫ̅.
English: Be not overwise in doing thy business; and boast not thyself in the time of thy distress.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩⲥ̅ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲕⲣ̅ ϩⲱⲃ ⲉⲕⲣ̅ϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲕⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉⲕϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲉⲕⲣ̅ϭⲣⲱϩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲓ̈ⲕ.
English: Better is he that laboureth, and aboundeth in all things, than he that boasteth himself, and wanteth bread.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙⲁⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲕⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲉⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲣⲁϣ: ⲛⲅ̅ϯ ⲛⲁⲥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲟ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉⲥⲙ̅ⲡϣⲁ.
English: My son, glorify thy soul in meekness, and give it honour according to the dignity thereof.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲧⲙⲁⲓ̈ⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲉⲧⲉϥⲯⲩⲭⲏ; ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲧⲙⲁⲓ̈ⲉ ⲡⲉⲧϣⲱⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲱⲛϩ̅;
English: Who will justify him that sinneth against his own soul? and who will honour him that dishonoureth his own life?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲁⲩϯ....... ⲁⲩⲱ ....ⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲙⲡ.....ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ.
English: The poor man is honoured for his skill, and the rich man is honoured for his riches.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧϣⲏⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ϥϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲏⲕⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧϣⲏⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲏⲕⲉ ϥϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲟϭ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ.
English: He that is honoured in poverty, how much more in riches? and he that is dishonourable in riches, how much more in poverty?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲑⲃ̅ⲃⲓⲏⲩ ⲛⲁϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲁⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲛⲁⲑⲙ̅ⲥⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ.
English: Wisdom lifteth up the head of him that is of low degree, and maketh him to sit among great men.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲥⲉϣ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲉϥϭⲁ.
English: Commend not a man for his beauty; neither abhor a man for his outward appearance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲉⲃⲓⲱ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲁⲗⲁⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϥⲕⲁⲣⲡⲟⲥ ⲡⲉ ⲧⲁⲣⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϩⲟⲗϭ̅.
English: The bee is little among such as fly; but her fruit is the chief of sweet things.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲃ̅ⲥⲱ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲉⲓⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: Boast not of thy clothing and raiment, and exalt not thyself in the day of honour:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ϩⲛ̅ϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲛⲉϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ϩⲏⲡ ⲉⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ.
English: for the works of the Lord are wonderful, and his works among men are hidden.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲩⲣⲁⲛⲛⲟⲥ ϩⲙⲟⲟⲥ ϩⲓ ⲡⲉⲥⲏⲧ ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲧⲟϭⲥ̅ ϩⲱⲱϥ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁϥⲫⲟⲣⲓ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϭⲣⲏⲡⲉ.
English: Many kings have sat down upon the ground; and one that was never thought of hath worn the crown.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ ϫⲓ ⲥⲱϣ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩϯ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲧⲁⲉⲓⲏⲩ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲛ̅ϭⲓϫ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛⲕⲟⲟⲩⲉ
English: Many mighty men have been greatly disgraced; and the honourable delivered into other men’s hands.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲙⲡⲁⲧⲕ̅ϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϭⲛ̅ⲁⲣⲓⲕⲉ: ⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲥ ⲛⲅ̅ⲉⲡⲓⲧⲓⲙⲁ.
English: Blame not before thou hast examined the truth: understand first, and then rebuke.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Answer not before thou hast heard the cause: neither interrupt men in the midst of their talk.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲧⲱⲛ ϩⲓ ϩⲱⲃ ⲉⲙ... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲥⲱⲟⲩϩ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ...... ⲣ̅ⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: Strive not in a matter that concerneth thee not; and sit not in judgment with sinners.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲣⲉ ⲛⲉⲕϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲁϣⲁⲓ̈: ⲉⲩϣⲁⲛ ⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛⲅ̅ⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲛ ⲉⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: My son, meddle not with many matters: for if thou meddle much, thou shalt not be innocent; and if thou follow after, thou shalt not obtain, neither shalt thou escape by fleeing.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲟⲛ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛ ⲡⲱⲧ ⲛⲅ̅ⲛⲁⲧⲁϩⲟ ⲁⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲣ̅ⲃⲟⲗ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛ ⲡⲱⲧ.
English: There is one that laboureth, and taketh pains, and maketh haste, and is so much the more behind.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧϩⲟⲥⲉ ⲉϥⲙⲟⲩⲕϩ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲉϥϭⲉⲡⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϥⲣ̅ϭⲣⲱϩ ⲛ̅ⲁⲣⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲩⲟ.
English: Again, there is another that is slow, and hath need of help, wanting ability, and full of poverty;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧϣⲱⲛⲉ ⲉϥⲭⲣⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϣⲟⲡϥ̅ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲉϥϣⲁⲁⲧ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲙ ⲉϥⲣ̅ϩⲟⲩⲟ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲏⲕⲉ
English: yet the eye of the Lord looked upon him for good, and set him up from his low estate,
